definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Sorbitol acetals is the most one kind of the nucleating agents for polypropylene crystallization.
sentences.chinese: 山梨醇縮醛是最重要的聚丙烯成核劑之一。

sentences.english: Monocyclic carboxylate is a dispersive-type polymer nucleating agent.
sentences.chinese: 單環羧酸鹽屬於分散型聚合物成核劑。

sentences.english: The Ag atoms nucleate and grow into nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 銀原子在玻璃中成核並生長成納米顆粒。

sentences.english: The rate of nucleation based on this mechanism has been calculated.
sentences.chinese: 根據這樣的機構我們得出有序核的成核率。

sentences.english: The process of microaldehyde deodorization for the PP transparent nucleating agent were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脫除聚丙烯透明成核劑中微量芳醛的方法。

sentences.english: The effects of self-seeding nucleation on crystallization behavior and morphology of PTT are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了自晶種成核對PTT結晶行爲及其形態的影響。

sentences.english: And the property of dissolvent will change the nucleation rate.
sentences.chinese: 溶劑的性質也將改變成核速率的大小。

sentences.english: Different preferred orientation growth is attributed to different nucleation mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 不同的成核機理導致了不同晶面擇優取向生長。

sentences.english: The nucleation mechanisms and colloid stability are the key aspects of emulsifier free emulsion polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 成核機理和穩定性是無皁乳液聚合的關鍵。

sentences.english: Starting as a regular war, it will progress to a nuclear and chemical war.
sentences.chinese: 開始作爲一個經常性的戰爭，它會發展成核和化學戰。

sentences.english: The influence of substrate pretreatment methods on the nucleation density of diamond films was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了襯底預處理方法對金剛石薄膜成核的影響。

sentences.english: Therefore, the mechanism of the formation initial condensate droplets for dropwise condensation accords with the hypothesis of surface nucleation sites.
sentences.chinese: 因此，滴狀冷凝初始液滴形成機理符合成核中心假說。

sentences.english: Adding nucleator in polymer is a commonly modifying method for plastics.
sentences.chinese: 添加成核劑是一種最常用的塑料改性方法。

sentences.english: A new synthetic method of substituted diarylphosphate salts was presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種取代二芳基磷酸鹽成核劑的合成新方法。

sentences.english: The process of nuclei formation of diamond film was observed with flame combustion.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用燃燒焰法觀察金剛石薄膜的成核生長過程。

sentences.english: Opinions on the research and development of the nucleators for PP are given.
sentences.chinese: 對成核劑今後研究和開發的問題提出了見解。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
abbr. of 樹枝狀晶|树枝状晶[shu4 zhi1 zhuang4 jing1]
